name: Darts Up 3D
description:
The ultimate darts game is now on Nintendo 3DS™.

Darts Up 3D is a fun game of darts in which you will have complete control over aiming thanks to the Nintendo 3DS™ motion sensor.
You can play with your friends and family, up to a maximum of 4 Players, using the Mii characters to create your profile.
Darts Up 3D has several playing modes, including the famous 501.

Features of Darts Up 3D:

Send the full Darts Up 3D using the "Download Play" option.
4 Players on just one Nintendo 3DS™.
Create your own profile using the Mii characters.
Use the motion sensor to aim and view the surroundings.
Entirely in 3D Stereoscopic.
Three playing modes, including 501!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
